channel.title: raspberrypi on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in raspberrypi on Alok's Blog

item.title: Raspberry Pi Project Ideas
item.description: Making projects with raspberry pi: Onion pi Code to automate flight timelapse : Pi cobbler for easy access to gpio pins web server with pi Arduino with pi : pyfirmata, pyserial Coding with scratch analysing loval network : Nagios Pi improve performance by boostraping pen drive instead of sd card to boot 9/. Making a battery pack for pi: UBEC : one with micro usb connector 3A 6S max 6A
